title: Trump Misstates Facts in Charlotte Refugee Case
summary: Trump's SOTU claim about Charlotte stabbing case is false; suspect was a U.S. citizen, not an immigrant.
charlotte_impact: Misinformation in high-profile cases can fuel xenophobia and distort public perception of immigration issues.

title: Hayward: Major Employer in Clemmons, NC
summary: Charlotte-based Hayward, a swimming pool filter maker, employs over 1,000 workers in Clemmons, NC.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the importance of manufacturing jobs and private employers in the local economy.

title: Charlotte Trade Shows Focus on ROI
summary: Exhibitors at Charlotte trade shows prioritize flexibility, visibility, and return on investment.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks VP in Charlotte
summary: Charlotte-based Mosaic Capital Partners is seeking a Vice President of Business Development.

title: Florence Airport Traffic Rises Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025 but lost American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the challenges and opportunities for regional airports in maintaining and expanding service.

title: Women Charged in Torture, Death of Girl in Charlotte
summary: Three women in Charlotte, NC, face charges in the death of a girl, allegedly kept in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Details a horrific case of child abuse and raises serious questions about child welfare.

title: Huntersville to Address NC-115 Congestion
summary: Huntersville plans to address severe traffic congestion on NC-115, a major local artery.

title: NC Lawmakers Divided Over Iran Strikes
summary: NC Republicans support Iran strikes; Democrats call them unconstitutional, demanding a vote.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Truck in Gastonia
summary: A sinkhole in Gastonia swallowed a pickup truck overnight; no injuries were reported.

title: Early Voting Ends for NC Primary

title: East Charlotte Shooting Leaves One Critically Injured
summary: An overnight shooting in east Charlotte critically injures one person on E W.T. Harris Boulevard.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte

charlotte_impact: Aims to improve traffic flow and reduce commute times for drivers in the area.

title: Woman Dies After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman dies weeks after an assault in east Charlotte; suspect is in custody as of Feb. 27, 2026.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the severity of violent crime and its lasting impact on victims and the community.
